concept.title: 8.103 Information on available excess personal property.

conbody.p: Information regarding the availability of excess personal property can be obtained through-

li.p:
(a)
Review of excess personal property catalogs and bulletins issued by the General Services Administration (GSA);

(c)
Submission of supply requirements to the regional offices of GSA (GSA Form 1539, Request for Excess Personal Property, is available for this purpose); and

(d)
Examination and inspection of reports and samples of excess personal property in GSA regional offices.
